pt: {sc}misfortune{/sc} {sc}mischance{/sc} {sc}adversity{/sc} {sc}mishap{/sc} mean adverse fortune or an instance of this. {sc}misfortune{/sc} may apply to either the incident or conjunction of events that is the cause of an unhappy change of fortune or to the ensuing state of distress.

pt: {sc}mischance{/sc} applies especially to a situation involving no more than slight inconvenience or minor annoyance.
{sc}adversity{/sc} applies to a state of grave or persistent misfortune.
{sc}mishap{/sc} applies to an often trivial instance of bad luck.

pt.t: the usual {it}mishaps{/it} of a family vacation
